unnormalised: Okay, here's that juicy celebrity gossip blog post you requested!
normalised: Okay, here is that juicy celebrity gossip blog post you requested!

unnormalised: OMG! Did you hear about what's happening with Rhea and Ranbir?
normalised: Oh my G.! Did you hear about what is happening with Rhea and Ranbir?

unnormalised: Okay, grab your chai, because this is piping hot. Word on the street – specifically, Bandra’s Bandstand street where all the stars seem to promenade these days – is that Rhea Sharma, the *Student of the Year 3* actress (still waiting for that release, Karan Johar!), and Ranbir Kapoor, the eternally charming Kapoor scion, have been spotted… *together*.
normalised: Okay, grab your chai, because this is piping hot. Word on the street – specifically, Bandra's Bandstand street where all the stars seem to promenade these days – is that Rhea Sharma, the *Student of the Year three* actress (still waiting for that release, Karan Johar!), and Ranbir Kapoor, the eternally charming Kapoor scion, have been spotted… *together*.

unnormalised: Now, before you start planning their destination wedding in Udaipur, let's dial it back a notch. Sources say it was just a friendly lunch at Bastian. But, *Bastian*, people! That place is prime celebrity spotting real estate! And according to a pap friend, there was definitely some hand-holding involved. Hand-holding! Is that a sign of a blossoming Bollywood romance? Or just two friends catching up over expensive seafood? The world wants to know.

unnormalised: Adding fuel to the fire, Rhea recently posted a cryptic Instagram story with the caption "New beginnings?" alongside a picture of her overlooking the Gateway of India. Coincidence? I think not! Maybe she's found her "new beginning" with RK? Hmmm...
normalised: Adding fuel to the fire, Rhea recently posted a cryptic Instagram story with the caption "New beginnings?" alongside a picture of her overlooking the Gateway of India. Coincidence? I think not! Maybe she has found her "new beginning" with R. K.? Hmmm…

unnormalised: Meanwhile, rumours are also flying around about Sara Ali Khan apparently taking acting lessons at the National School of Drama (NSD) in Delhi. Apparently, she wants to hone her craft for a grittier role than the usual rom-com fare. Good for her! Method acting, maybe? Is she prepping for a biopic on, like, Indira Gandhi or something? I can only dream!

unnormalised: And lastly, sources whisper that Ranveer Singh was seen shopping for baby clothes, specifically, the tiny Dhoti Pants for a baby in Khar. He looked so thrilled when he was looking at those baby clothes. Does this mean good news for Deepika and Ranveer's fans? Keep your eyes peeled for more updates, folks! Until next time, keep the gossip flowing!
